markers.marker: Nagisa and Buffy feel differently about high school.
This is Nagisa's first final stage line. It does not repeat.
This is Nagisa's second final stage line. It does not repeat.
Nagisa has never played strip poker before this game.
When introducing herself when Marinette is present, she mentions that her name can be written with one Chinese character (kanji).
Nagisa wants a little sister like the innocent female who removed a minor item.
Nagisa's father claims that she has a mysterious scar on her butt.
Nagisa claims to have played the Tomoyo After game.
In the first round, Nagisa can announce that she didn't realise that boys would be playing too.
Nagisa has several opportunities to turn around and reveal her backside during the game. This marker allows her opponents to request that she do it again.
Nagisa can make a tentacle comparison when playing with Zone-tan.
